scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint Luke by the presence of his symbol, the ox, is depicted writing in a large open book. He is seated, dressed in a blue undergarment and a red robe with gold trim, and wears a halo, indicating his saintly status. The scene takes place indoors, with a window featuring diamond-shaped panes visible in the background. The ox, a common attribute of Saint Luke, is shown to the right of the saint, looking towards the viewer with a gentle expression.
